name: Dice in Space
description:
GMTK 2022 game jam entry.

WASD to move

Space to roll dice 

Left click/hold to shoot

Roll die to swap your weapon out for a new one once it runs out of ammo. Collect new dice every 2 waves, and try to last as long as you can!

Some Weapon info:

Telestomp lets you teleport into and kill an enemy. Phase Rifle lets you shoot through walls. Chainsaw deals damage when colliding with an enemy. Power rifle and Deagle can hit multiple enemies.

Credits:
Programming by Justin Dugan
Art and Music by J. Evans
